column4: any one useing a 8800GT in Hardy? if so how did you get your nvidia driver installed and working
you need to go into synaptic, enable third party software repositories, then install nvidia-glx-new
what one? all i have listed in there seems to be ones for 7.10, the 1 thats listed in there for 8.04 is already checked
also it shows that i have nvidia-glx-new installed
